proxy

Class ProxyServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • proxy.ProxyServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServer

    public class ProxyServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServer
    A Server Proxy class that implements the Server Interface
    Domain
    • singleton: singleton instance for proxy server; null until static setSingleton is used
    • clientCommunicator: of interface ICommunicator and used to carry out http communcation with server
    • cookieTranslator: of interface ITranslator and used to translate encoded cookie headers; must be set to correct type to translate cookie headers (should be TranslatorJSON for catan game)
    • cookieEncoding: encoding used by cookie headers (should be "UTF-8" for catan game)

    • Method Detail

      • setSingleton

        public static void setSingleton(ICommunicator clientCommunicator,
                ITranslator cookieTranslator,
                java.lang.String cookieEncoding)
        Configures singleton instance of ProxyServer
        Parameters:
        clientCommunicator - ::= client communicator object containing server connection/communication abilities including a translator
        cookieTranslator - ::= translator for converting cookie headers into java PlayerCookie object
        cookieEncoding - ::= encoding format of response cookie (should normally be "UTF-8"
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        if no singleton instance has been created yet 1) creates singleton instance of ProxyServer Configures singleton according to provided parameters singleton.clientCommunicator = clientCommunicator; singleton.cookieTranslator = cookieTranslator; singleton.cookieEncoding = cookieEncoding;

        createGame in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        randomTiles - : create game with randomized game tiles
        randomNumbers - : create game with randomized numbers ("chits")
        randomPorts - : create game with randomized ports
        name - : the name which the created game will have
        cookie - : catan cookie as set by server
